args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- If f : U -> C is holomorphic on a domain U âŠ‚ C, then f is analytic.
    More precisely: if U is open and f is differentiable on U, then f is analytic at every z0 âˆˆ U. -/
theorem holomorphic_on_analytic (U : Set â„‚) {f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚} (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : DifferentiableOn â„‚ f U) (z0 : â„‚) (hz0 : z0 âˆˆ U) :
  AnalyticAt â„‚ f z0 := by sorry
